title: How to Download .exe Files to Your PC

steps.title: Make sure your "Tech guy/girl" isn't very good at tracking e-mails or computer logs, this is highly unlikely considering they would not have the position if they were not good at it.
steps.content: Make sure your "Tech guy/girl" isn't very good at tracking e-mails or computer logs, this is highly unlikely considering they would not have the position if they were not good at it.

steps.title: Make sure you can hide the program you wish to download in your computer without it being discovered or uncovered after you leave the workplace.
steps.content: Make sure you can hide the program you wish to download in your computer without it being discovered or uncovered after you leave the workplace.

steps.title: Connect to an instant messaging system or have a cell phone ready to text a friend information.
steps.content: Connect to an instant messaging system or have a cell phone ready to text a friend information.

steps.title: Ask your friend to download the file
steps.content: Ask your friend to download the file

steps.title: Tell your friend to virus scan his or her computer and also the file to ensure computer safety.
steps.content: Tell your friend to virus scan his or her computer and also the file to ensure computer safety.

steps.title: Tell your friend to change the extension to ".txt" or anything besides ".exe"
steps.content: Tell your friend to change the extension to ".txt" or anything besides ".exe"

steps.title: Tell him or her to virus scan the file after the change.
steps.content: Tell him or her to virus scan the file after the change.

steps.title: Then tell him to send it to you via some e-mail service
steps.content: Then tell him to send it to you via some e-mail service

steps.title: make sure to virus scan the file before and after the change once more to ensure computer safety.
steps.content: make sure to virus scan the file before and after the change once more to ensure computer safety.

steps.title: You now have downloaded an .exe file secretly!
steps.content: You now have downloaded an .exe file secretly!
